sentences.en: Cold and hot potable water, HVAC chilled and hot water. Evaporative cooling systems.
sentences.cn: 冷和热饮用水, 暖通空调冷却水和热水. 蒸汽冷却系统.

sentences.en: Conclusion: The contamination of entering - ship potable waters were severely by pathogenic Vibrio.
sentences.cn: 结论: 入境船舶上的饮用水被致病性弧菌污染较严重.

sentences.en: Containers are flushed with compressed air or potable water before filling.
sentences.cn: 容器在灌注之前经过压缩空气或饮用水冲洗.

sentences.en: Disinfection of potable drinking a fresh drink of choice for the physical method of disinfection sterilization.
sentences.cn: 饮用水消毒的新鲜饮料的首选物理消毒方法消毒.

sentences.en: DO NOT add any chemicals to the system piping which will contaminate the potable water supply.
sentences.cn: 不要在管道系统中添加任何可能会造成饮用水污染的任何化学物品.

sentences.en: Food processing converts relatively bulky, perishable and typically inedible raw materials into more useful, shelf-stable and palatable foods or potable beverages.
sentences.cn: 食品加工将相对庞大的，易腐烂的，通常是不可食用的原料加工成更有用的，耐储存的和可口的食品或适于饮用的饮料。

sentences.en: He could be doused in water but it had to be potable.
sentences.cn: 他能够被他可以被浇水,但必须是可饮用的水.

sentences.en: If it does then potable water, one of the necessities of life, may become easier for many people to obtain.
sentences.cn: 如果确实可以的话，那么生命的必需品之一——饮用水，对多数人来说将更容易获得。

sentences.en: In addition said system can produce a quantity of potable water.
sentences.cn: 另外,该系统同时还会产生一定数量的饮用水.

sentences.en: In general, only one third of health facilities have potable water, and just one in four remain linked to the general sewerage system or to a power supply.
sentences.cn: 一般而言，近三分之一的卫生设施有适合饮用的水，并且仅仅四分之一仍然与一般排水系统或电源连接。

sentences.en: Is the tap water at my home potable?
sentences.cn: 家中食水可由水龙头直接饮用?

sentences.en: QD Manual cutting off machine is a potable plate - cutting machine, fit in cutting at spot.
sentences.cn: QD机为轻便型剪板机, 适应现场灵活剪板.

sentences.en: Series 775 Double Check Valve Assemblies provide protection of the potable water supply for non - health hazard - connections .
sentences.cn: 系列775双止回阀总成防止 交叉连接 处 非 健康危害的流体污染饮用水供应系统.

sentences.en: She has a bio-sand water filter in her home and is proud to be able to keep her family healthy with safe, potable water.
sentences.cn: 她在她的家里有一个生物沙水过滤器并且以能饮用安全、适于饮用水保持她的家庭健康而自豪。

sentences.en: Sink plumbed with potable water, plus soap and towels provided for employees.
sentences.cn: 有供应可饮用水的洗手池, 有提供给员工使用的肥皂和手巾.

sentences.en: The new potable computers are going likehot cakes.
sentences.cn: 新的笔记本电脑卖得很快.

sentences.en: The potable water expansion tank shall be of drawn steel construction.
sentences.cn: 这种饮用水膨胀罐应该是拉制钢结构.

sentences.en: Thermal ground water and potable natural water resources are rich and widely distributed in Shanxi province.
sentences.cn: 山西省地下热水及饮用天然矿泉水资源丰富,分布广泛.

sentences.en: They set up purifying systems in places where the water was not potable.
sentences.cn: 他们在许多水质不适合饮用的地方建立了净化系统。

sentences.en: We now happily pay as much as four times the cost of gasoline for potable water that we could have for free from fountains and taps.
sentences.cn: 我们现在高高兴兴地花四倍于汽油的价格买饮用水，而这些水我们完全可以从饮水机和水龙头那免费接取。

trans.tran_en: potable water is safe to drink
